summary: All Housecarls are now gathering at the Windstad Manor
descriptionHtml:
[*]All Housecarls are now gathering at the Windstad Manor instead of the house of their respective Hold.

[*]All Housecarls level cap set to 250
[*]All Housecarls are essential
[*]All Housecarls are linked to Windstad Manor
[*]Rayya\'s default headgear removed
[*]Rayya\'s hairstyle changed from redguard4 to redguard2
[*]Rayya\'s facegen changed and softened
[*]Sonir (Windstad Manor bard) is skinned as Lisette (Solitude Winking Skeever tavern\'s bard)
[*]Increased the maximum number of hearthfire houses house chickens (6)
[*]Increased the maximum number of hearthfire houses cows (2)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Requirements:
Skyrim 1.8 and over
Hearthfire DLC
author: dotjeal
